entry.title: WIND WARNING , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
